text: was a Japanese daimyō of the Edo period, who ruled Hiroshima Domain. His childhood name was Sennosuke (千之助), later Tamegorō (為五郎). He was succeeded by his nephew Asano Nagakoto (1842-1937), son of his brother Asano Toshiteru. ==Family== * Father: Asano Nagatomo * Wife: Shunhime, daughter of Asano Nagakane * Adopted Sons: ** Asano Nagakoto ** Asano Yukitoshi (1861–1936) ==References== Category:1812 births Category:1872 deaths Category:Daimyo Category:Asano clan
title: Asano Nagamichi
